text: Gennady Kovalev (10 October 1945 - 30 December 2024) was a Russian biathlete. Kovalev represented the Soviet Union at international competitions. He won at the Biathlon World Championships 1973 the gold medal in the 4 Ã— 7.5 km relay event and the silver medal in the 20 km individual event. After his biathlon career, he succesfully ran a biathlon school for young people. Kovalyev died in Chita on 30 December 2024 at the age of 79 years old. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Soviet sportspeople Category:2024 deaths
